description: I had lots of beet greens on hand during the week that I was testing all of these beet recipes, so I decided to combine them with julienned beets in a stir-fry The greens should be crisp-tender.
title: Stir-Fried Beet Greens, Tofu and Beets
title_page: Stir-Fried Beet Greens, Tofu and Beets Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
I had lots of beet greens on hand during the week that I was testing all of these beet recipes, so I decided to combine them with julienned beets in a stir-fry. The greens should be crisp-tender.
Featured in: Beets, Raw And Cooked.
